title: Body Contouring & Regenerative Sculpting
description: Medical-grade injectables and regenerative therapies that contour, hydrate, and refine the body without surgery.
longDescription: Whether you want lifted curves, smoother skin, or relief from excessive sweating, our body aesthetic programme blends regenerative biostimulants, hyaluronic acid fillers, and targeted device therapy to reshape safely. Every plan is delivered by Dr. Syed Nadeem Abbas with precise mapping, ultrasound guidance when required, and concierge-level aftercare so results feel as good as they look.

seo.metaTitle: Body Aesthetic Treatments London | Contouring & Regenerative Sculpting | Dr. SNA
seo.metaDescription: Discover non-surgical body contouring in London: Lanluma buttock augmentation, dermal fillers, cellulite reduction, hyperhidrosis care, and décolletage rejuvenation.
seo.h1: Advanced Body Aesthetic Treatments in London

hero.headline: Reshape with Confidence
hero.subheadline: Injectable contouring and regenerative therapy for curves, tone, and silky skin.

introduction.title: Doctor-Led Body Design
introduction.content: Traditional body sculpting can feel invasive or unpredictable. Our approach uses medical injectables, collagen stimulators, and vascular support to build shape gradually with zero downtime. Expect 3D treatment planning, ultrasound safety checks, and clear aftercare so you maintain the results you invest in.

treatmentCategories.title: Curves & Volume
treatmentCategories.description: Injectable buttock enhancement using collagen stimulators or hyaluronic acid fillers.

treatmentCategories.title: Skin Smooth & Tight
treatmentCategories.description: Treat cellulite, crepey texture, and stubborn fat pockets with regenerative blends.

treatmentCategories.title: Functional Comfort
treatmentCategories.description: Target excessive sweating to boost confidence at work, gym, or events.

buttock-augmentation-lanluma.title: Lanluma® Buttock Augmentation
buttock-augmentation-lanluma.shortDescription: Biostimulant injectable that sculpts hips and buttocks for long-lasting lift.
buttock-augmentation-lanluma.description: Lanluma (poly-L-lactic acid) stimulates collagen production to gradually add projection, roundness, and smooth cellulite dimples. Perfect for hip dips or enhancing curves without implants.

buttock-augmentation-dermal.title: Hyaluronic Acid Buttock Fillers
buttock-augmentation-dermal.shortDescription: Instant volume and shaping with premium HA body fillers.
buttock-augmentation-dermal.description: For immediate curve enhancement, we use high-density hyaluronic acid fillers placed strategically to lift, round, and define the buttocks or hips.

fat-reduction-cellulite.title: Cellulite & Fat Reduction
fat-reduction-cellulite.shortDescription: Collagen stimulators + enzyme injections to smooth dimples and contour thighs.
fat-reduction-cellulite.description: A bespoke blend of deoxycholate, polynucleotides, and biostimulants breaks down stubborn fat pockets while tightening overlying skin for a dimple-free finish.

excessive-sweating.title: Excessive Sweating (Hyperhidrosis) Treatment
excessive-sweating.shortDescription: Botulinum toxin injections that block overactive sweat glands.
excessive-sweating.description: Precise micro-injections stop sweat production in underarms, palms, or soles for up to 9 months, keeping you comfortable and confident.

decolletage-treatment.title: Décolletage Rejuvenation
decolletage-treatment.shortDescription: Polynucleotides and skin boosters to smooth crepey chest skin.
decolletage-treatment.description: Hydrating injectables paired with LED therapy rebuild collagen, even pigmentation, and soften lines across the chest and shoulders.

benefits.title: Why Patients Choose Dr. SNA for Body Aesthetics

items.title: Regenerative focus

steps.description: Discuss goals, capture imagery, and evaluate skin quality.

steps.title: Treatment Plan
steps.description: Choose between Lanluma, HA fillers, cellulite cocktails, or sweat control.

steps.title: Procedure Day
steps.description: Comfort protocols + precision injections in a private suite.

steps.title: Aftercare & Review
steps.description: Lymphatic guidance, supplements, and review at 8 weeks.
